findings.message:
Reentrancy in WUSDMaster.stake(uint256) (WUSDMaster.sol#703-729):
	External calls:
	- usdt.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount) (WUSDMaster.sol#708)
	- usdt.safeTransfer(treasury,feeAmount) (WUSDMaster.sol#711)
	- usdt.approve(address(wswapRouter),wexAmount) (WUSDMaster.sol#715)
	- wswapRouter.swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens(wexAmount,0,swapPath,address(this),block.timestamp) (WUSDMaster.sol#717-723)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- wusdClaimAmount[msg.sender] = amount (WUSDMaster.sol#725)
	WUSDMaster.wusdClaimAmount (WUSDMaster.sol#620) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- WUSDMaster.wusdClaimAmount (WUSDMaster.sol#620)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in WUSDMaster.redeem(uint256) (WUSDMaster.sol#742-751):
	External calls:
	- wusd.burn(msg.sender,amount) (WUSDMaster.sol#746)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- usdtClaimAmount[msg.sender] = amount (WUSDMaster.sol#747)
	WUSDMaster.usdtClaimAmount (WUSDMaster.sol#622) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- WUSDMaster.usdtClaimAmount (WUSDMaster.sol#622)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
